item.title: Tifu
item.description: Today I fucked up. I tried to crash an entire satellite constellation. It was a simple mistake really I was messing around with some our stupid system to deploy changes. We had a really old system based on a dead version of Unix and our configuration management was some ancient version of RCS. I’m pretty sure that nobody had used it in ages or made changes of any kind because what happened was me being a new hotshit member of the team.
